contexts.context: ...our unsuccess may have been less insidious than the <mark>automatic</mark> superlatives which nowadays kill the new by absorbing it...
...virtue of formal metrical rules is that they forbid <mark>automatic</mark>  responses and,by forcing the  poet to have second...
